00011   AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::AhcMedianFilterTempProvider( AhcMapper const *mapper)
00012     :_moduleMeanTemp(AhcTempProvider::N_MODULES, 0),
00013      _moduleMeanTempRMS(AhcTempProvider::N_MODULES, 0),
00014      _moduleMeanCount(AhcTempProvider::N_MODULES, 0)
00015   {
00016     _mapper = mapper;
00017   }
00018   
00019   float AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::getCellTemp( int module, int chip, int chan )
00020   {
00021     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol || newSanityRange ) {
00022       applyCorrection();
00023     }
00024     
00025     return sensorTemp.at(module-1).at(getSensor(chip,chan));
00026     //return _caloMeanTemp;
00027   }
00028   
00029   float AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::getCellTempError( int module, int chip, int chan )
00030   {
00031     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol || newSanityRange ) {
00032       applyCorrection();
00033     }
00034     
00035     return sensorTempError.at(module-1).at(getSensor(chip,chan));
00036   }
00037   
00038   
00039   float AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::getAvgModuleTemp( unsigned module )
00040   {
00041     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol || newSanityRange ) {
00042       applyCorrection();
00043     }
00044     
00045     return _moduleMeanTemp[module-1];   
00046   }
00047   
00048   
00049   float AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::getAvgTemp()
00050   {
00051     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol || newSanityRange ) {
00052       applyCorrection();
00053     }
00054     
00055     return _caloMeanTemp;
00056   }
00057   
00058   
00059   float AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::getSensorTemp( int module, int sensor )
00060   {
00061     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol || newSanityRange ) 
00062       {
00063         applyCorrection();
00064       }
00065     
00066     if (sensor > 4) throw std::invalid_argument( "AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::"
00067                                                  "AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::getSensorTemp: "
00068                                                  " sensor out of range ( > 4)" );
00069     return sensorTemp.at(module-1).at(sensor);
00070     //return _caloMeanTemp;
00071   }
00072   
00073   
00074   
00078   int AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::getSensor( int chip, int chan )
00079   {
00080     if( chip == 0 ) return 0;
00081     else if( (chip > 0) && (chip < 4) ) return 1;
00082     else if( (chip > 3) && (chip < 8) ) return 2;
00083     else if( (chip > 7) && (chip < 11) ) return 3;
00084     else if( chip == 11 ) return 4;
00085     
00086     throw std::out_of_range( "AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::getSensor(): "
00087                              "argument chip out of range (0...11)");
00088     
00089     return 0; //never happens logically 
00090   }
00091   
00092   bool AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::isBadValue( float t )
00093   {
00094     return (t<_sanityMin) || (t>_sanityMax);
00095   }
00096   
00097   void AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::applyCorrection()
00098   {
00099     if(!_sroModCol) throw std::invalid_argument( "AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::"
00100                                                  "applyCorrection(): "
00101                                                  " null pointer _sroModCol!" );
00102     
00103     //  throw an exception when no sensor calib is available - 
00104     //    this is essential to retain consistency for correction of T-drifts.
00105     //  Catch this exception in your code if you can live without absolute
00106     //    temperature values
00107     //    if(!_calibCol) throw std::invalid_argument( "AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::"
00108     //                                          "applyCorrection(): "
00109     //                                          " null pointer _calibCol!" );
00110     
00111     if( newCalibCol || newSroModCol ) {
00112       updateCache();
00113     }
00114     
00115     _caloMeanTemp=0;
00116     _caloMeanTempRMS=0;
00117     _caloMeanCount=0;
00118     
00119     //holds all the modules that do not have any sensor in sanity range
00120     vector<int> bad_mods;
00121     
00122     for( int i=0; i<_sroModCol->getNumberOfElements(); i++ ) {
00123       CALICE::AhcSlowReadoutModBlock mb( _sroModCol->getElementAt(i) );
00124       
00125       int module = mb.getModuleNumber()-1;
00126       _moduleMeanTemp[module]=0;
00127       _moduleMeanTempRMS[module]=0;
00128       _moduleMeanCount[module]=0;
00129       
00130       for(unsigned s=0; s<N_SENSORS && s<mb.getCmbTemperatures().size(); s++)
00131         {
00132           //we calculate the mean, excluding bad sensors
00133           if(!isBadValue(sensorTemp[module][s])) {
00134             _moduleMeanTemp[module]    += sensorTemp[module][s];
00135             _moduleMeanTempRMS[module] += sensorTemp[module][s] * sensorTemp[module][s];
00136             _moduleMeanCount[module]++;
00137             
00138             _caloMeanTemp += sensorTemp[module][s];
00139             _caloMeanTempRMS += sensorTemp[module][s] * sensorTemp[module][s];
00140             _caloMeanCount++; 
00141           }
00142         }
00143       
00144       if(_moduleMeanCount[module]>0) {
00145         _moduleMeanTemp[module] /= _moduleMeanCount[module];
00146         _moduleMeanTempRMS[module] /= _moduleMeanCount[module];
00147         _moduleMeanTempRMS[module] -= _moduleMeanTemp[module] * _moduleMeanTemp[module];
00148         _moduleMeanTempRMS[module] = sqrt( _moduleMeanTempRMS[module] );
00149         
00150         //now take out the bad guys and replace'em with the mean
00151         for( unsigned s=0; s<N_SENSORS; s++ ) {
00152           if(isBadValue(sensorTemp[module][s])) {
00153             sensorTemp[module][s]      = _moduleMeanTemp[module];
00154             sensorTempError[module][s] = _moduleMeanTempRMS[module];
00155           }
00156         }
00157       } else {
00158         bad_mods.push_back(module); 
00159       }
00160     }
00161     
00162     if(_caloMeanCount>0) {
00163       _caloMeanTemp /= _caloMeanCount;
00164       _caloMeanTempRMS /= _caloMeanCount;
00165     }
00166     
00167     for(unsigned i=0; i<bad_mods.size(); i++) {
00168       fill(sensorTemp[bad_mods[i]].begin(),sensorTemp[bad_mods[i]].end(), _caloMeanTemp );
00169       
00170       fill( sensorTempError[bad_mods[i]].begin(),
00171             sensorTempError[bad_mods[i]].end(),
00172             _caloMeanTempRMS
00173             );
00174       _moduleMeanTemp[bad_mods[i]] = _caloMeanTemp;
00175       _moduleMeanTempRMS[bad_mods[i]] = _caloMeanTempRMS;
00176       //int currentLayer = _mapper->getK(bad_mods[i]);
00177       //std::cout << "All sensors are bad in module = " << bad_mods[i] << ", layer = " << currentLayer << std::endl;
00178     }
00179     
00180     //averaging:
00181     // 1) make median filter with 3 layer window from 2 to 37 layers
00182     // 2) set average per module to all sensors
00183  
00184     //const unsigned maxK = _mapper->getMaxK();
00185     int module2layer[39];
00186     int layer2module[39];
00187   
00188     module2layer[0] = 0;
00189     layer2module[0] = 0;
00190  
00191     for( unsigned module=1; module<=38; module++ ) {
00192       unsigned layer = _mapper->getK(module);
00193       //std::cout << "module,layer" << module << "," << layer << std::endl;
00194       module2layer[module] = layer;
00195       layer2module[layer] = module;  
00196     }
00197         
00198     float moduleMeanTempMedianFiltered[39];
00199     
00200     moduleMeanTempMedianFiltered[0] = 0.;
00201         
00202     for (unsigned iLayer=2; iLayer<=37; iLayer++){
00203       float temperatureForMedian[3];
00204       temperatureForMedian[0] = _moduleMeanTemp[layer2module[iLayer-1]-1];
00205       temperatureForMedian[1] = _moduleMeanTemp[layer2module[iLayer]-1];
00206       temperatureForMedian[2] = _moduleMeanTemp[layer2module[iLayer+1]-1];
00207       float median = this->median(&temperatureForMedian[0], 3);
00208       moduleMeanTempMedianFiltered[layer2module[iLayer]] = median;
00209     }
00210     moduleMeanTempMedianFiltered[layer2module[1]] = _moduleMeanTemp[layer2module[1]-1];
00211     moduleMeanTempMedianFiltered[layer2module[38]] = _moduleMeanTemp[layer2module[38]-1];
00212     
00213     float newCaloMeanTemp = 0.;
00214     
00215     for( unsigned module=1; module<=38; module++ ) {
00216       for( unsigned s=0; s<N_SENSORS; s++ ) {
00217         sensorTemp[module-1][s]      = moduleMeanTempMedianFiltered[module];
00218         sensorTempError[module-1][s] = _moduleMeanTempRMS[module-1];
00219       }
00220     _moduleMeanTemp[module-1] = moduleMeanTempMedianFiltered[module];
00221     newCaloMeanTemp += moduleMeanTempMedianFiltered[module]; 
00222     }
00223 
00224     _caloMeanTemp = newCaloMeanTemp/38.;
00225     
00226     newCalibCol = false;
00227     newSroModCol = false;
00228     newSanityRange = false;
00229   }
00230   
00231 
00232   /**********************************************************************************/
00233   /*                                                                                */
00234   /*                                                                                */
00235   /*                                                                                */
00236   /**********************************************************************************/
00237   double AhcMedianFilterTempProvider::median(float a[], int n)
00238   {  
00239     float temp;
00240     
00241     for(int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
00242       {
00243         for( int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j)
00244           {
00245             if(a[i] > a[j])
00246               {     
00247                 temp = a[j];
00248                 a[j] = a[i];
00249                 a[i] = temp;        
00250               } 
00251           }/*end loop over j*/
00252       }/*end loop over i*/
00253     
00254     if(n % 2 == 0)
00255       {
00256         return (a[n/2]+a[n/2-1])/2;
00257       }
00258     else
00259       {
00260         return a[n/2];
00261       }
00262   }
